pages.text: An $(item)Explorer Map$() is a special $(item)Map$() used to aid in finding rare generated structures, including $(thing)Woodland Mansions$(), $(thing)Ocean Monuments$(), and $(thing)Buried Treasures$(). $(br2)These maps can be traded from a $(thing)Cartographer Villager$() or found in $(thing)Underwater Ruins$() or $(thing)Shipwrecks$().
